Articles.Content:
I built a rocket with 2 engines in 1 stage and i don't understand why i can't control gimbal . 

https://imgur.com/kcFJbvV

MJ information is "Control Disable (Avionics) "

I can't control it manualy too .

this is a larger version of another rocket that works fine (I added 1 stage and increased the fuel tank so I needed 2 engines )

By enlarging the rocket, have you gone over the mass limit for the avionics you are using?

"In RP-0, avionics units have a maximum amount of mass they can control."

https://github.com/KSP-RO/RP-0/wiki/Procedural-Avionics

I would expect RP-1 to be similar.
